title: Mitigation Execution Report
description: Standardized output schema required from Mitigation Handlers (e.g., CRoT, Sentinels) upon attempting a mitigation action. This schema is designed to map directly into the 'execution_status' field of the Governance Mitigation Action (GMA) log.

status.description: The terminal result state of the mitigation attempt.

applied_timestamp.description: The precise timestamp when the action result was finalized.

error_details.description: Detailed error message if the status is FAILURE or PARTIAL_FAILURE.
